_comment: Tour Configuration - Edit the title and description text below
_instructions: Each module has steps. Each step needs: element (CSS selector), title, description, and position (top/bottom/left/right)

flashcards.title: Welcome to Flashcards!
flashcards.description: Study vocabulary with interactive flashcards. Click cards to flip between the word and translation.

flashcards.title: Voice Practice Mode
flashcards.description: Enable this to practice speaking! You'll be able to record your pronunciation and compare it with native audio.

flashcards.title: Choose Translation Language
flashcards.description: For Maranao and Sinama, select whether you want to see English or Cebuano translations on the card backs.

flashcards.title: Flashcard Display
flashcards.description: Click any card to flip it and see the translation. Audio will play automatically if available.

flashcards.title: Navigation Controls
flashcards.description: Use Previous/Next to move between pages, or Restart to go back to the beginning. You can also use arrow keys!

match.title: Welcome to Picture Match!
match.description: Test your vocabulary by matching words with their corresponding pictures.

match.title: Choose Your Mode
match.description: Review Mode: Practice until you master each word (repeat multiple times). Test Mode: One chance per word with a final score.

match.title: Review Repetitions
match.description: In Review Mode, set how many times you need to match each word correctly before it's considered mastered (default: 3 times).

match.title: Track Your Progress
match.description: Watch your progress bar fill up as you correctly match more words!

match.title: How to Play
match.description: Click a word from the top row, then click the matching picture below. Lines will connect your matches!

match.title: Ready to Start?
match.description: Click Start to begin matching! Good luck!

match-sound.title: Welcome to Audio Match!
match-sound.description: Listen to audio and match it with the correct picture. This helps develop your listening skills!

match-sound.title: Choose Your Mode
match-sound.description: Review Mode: Keep practicing each word until you master it. Test Mode: One attempt per word with scoring.

match-sound.title: Review Repetitions
match-sound.description: Set how many correct matches needed before a word is mastered in Review Mode.

match-sound.title: Listen and Match
match-sound.description: Audio will play automatically. Click the picture that matches what you hear. Click the speaker icon to replay!

match-sound.title: Progress Tracker
match-sound.description: See how many words you've successfully matched!

quiz.title: Welcome to Unsa Ni?
quiz.description: "Unsa Ni?" means "What is this?" in Cebuano. Type the correct word for each picture!

quiz.title: Select Mode
quiz.description: Review Mode: Practice with spaced repetition until mastered. Test Mode: Go through all cards once with scoring.

quiz.title: Picture Display
quiz.description: Look at the picture and type the corresponding word in your target language.

quiz.title: Type Your Answer
quiz.description: Enter the word in the input field and press Enter or click Submit. The system accepts multiple correct spellings!

quiz.title: Score Tracking
quiz.description: In Test Mode, see your correct and incorrect counts here as you progress.

rec.title: Welcome to Voice Recorder!
rec.description: This tool lets you record, upload, or select audio files for vocabulary cards.

rec.title: Select Language
rec.description: Choose which language you want to work with (Cebuano, Maranao, or Sinama).

rec.title: Translation Language
rec.description: For Maranao and Sinama, select whether you want to see English or Cebuano translations.

rec.title: Search Cards
rec.description: Quickly find specific words by typing in the search box.

rec.title: Filter by Lesson
rec.description: Filter cards to show only a specific lesson range.

rec.title: Audio Cards Table
rec.description: Click on any audio badge to open the recording modal. Badges show the word variant and current audio status.

rec.title: Save Your Changes
rec.description: After recording or assigning audio files, don't forget to click Save Changes to update the manifest!
